Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: Creating a dice GUI was something i had on my list, but given my limited out of work hours and the inherent issues with 51% and withdrawl, I left it alone after knocking up the TUI. Far down my list now, if at all. Much more interested in implementing LBS via oracles now.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
```From my testing on DICEv1 anyone looking to improve it needs to start with the following:
1) Show if the contract has entropy TX in diceinfo 
2) Have a table end parameter on table creation, where the dice contract expires and the funds can be withdrawn by the creator
3) Figure some solution to scale, a single table can only take so many parallell bets before it just stops working. 
4) Make a GUI to make it easier for people to play```

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: In that order

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: the 51% problem is low chances with close enough dPoW freq... we were gfong to try and notarise the chain with just 2 blocks, this could also be solved, by having a single miner, like I have done with STREAMER chain, and have all coins mined out of the faucet.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Or if you want to bet wirh real money, use a sister chain, where coins are mined/ bought and MoMoM migrate them to the DICE chain to play dice.
